```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Header redifinition
cn_enq = c(
  "age",
  "gender",
  "diplome",
  "major_field",
  "year_exp",
  "year_foreign",
  "current_loc",
  "public_private",
  "contract",
  "nb_bio_with",
  "nb_bioinfo_with",
  "nb_other_with",
  "position_title",
  "salary",
  "OS",
  "prog_language",
  "lang_dev_web",
  "lang_bdd",
  "lang_scripting",
  "lang_stats_anal",
  "lang_sys_admin",
  "lang_app_dev",
  "lang_other"
)

# Loading data
df_enq = read.table("data/questionnaire_bioinfo_fr_2018.tsv", 
                    skip = 2, 
                    header = TRUE, 
                    encoding = "UTF-8", 
                    check.names = FALSE, 
                    col.names = cn_enq)

# libraries
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
```

## Résumé des données
* Nombre de répondants : `r nrow(df_enq)`
```{r summary, echo=FALSE}
gender_bp = ggplot(df_enq, aes(x = gender)) + geom_bar(aes(y = (..count..)/sum(..count..))) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ylab("Percentage") +
  ylim(0,0.8)
age_bp = ggplot(df_enq, aes(x = age)) + geom_bar(aes(y = (..count..)/sum(..count..))) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ylab("Percentage") +
  ylim(0,0.8)
major_field_bp = ggplot(df_enq, aes(x = major_field)) + geom_bar(aes(y = (..count..)/sum(..count..))) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ylab("Percentage") +
  ylim(0,0.8) +
  coord_flip()

grid.arrange(gender_bp, age_bp, major_field_bp, nrow = 2)
```
